inspect electrical wiring in living room - call mike the electrician
order 10 units hardwood flooring from XYZ Supplies
measure kitchen for custom cabinets - 5/20
call Mr. Smith to confirm paint color choices - call back in 2 days
schedule follow-up for HVAC inspection
get plumbing supplies for bathroom reno
send updated project timeline to client - 5/18
meet with Jane (interior designer) about layout changes
confirm new windows delivery date with ABC Glass Co
prep cost estimate for landscaping project - 5/22
